data.eml:eml: Two new bithecal earthworms of the genus Amynthas (Oligochaeta: Megascolecidae) from Laos

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hong, Yong (2008): Two new bithecal earthworms of the genus Amynthas (Oligochaeta: Megascolecidae) from Laos. Zootaxa 1914: 57-61, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.184583
